= Estimated Accrual Report =

Labor data comes from Billing History:
	Client: Shell Puget Sound Refinery
	Job: Group By All Jobs
	Sub Job: Group by All Sub Jobs
	Date View: Month
	Start: First of month
	End: First of month

Using this data, forecast total hours for the month using simple ratio.

Non-labor data comes from Billing Services (Mary Shoemaker). This is typically not available until Wednesday. She stores this file in [[file:///P:/Project Controls/Accounting Data/Billing by Client/]]


Insert columns for client job number and use VLOOKUP to fill.

Filter for Estimated Labor to Bill > $50k.

Send result to GXAOPUSPR-ProjectControls@Shell.com.
